subtitleNullable: Tracking millions of Etsy shops data including sales, ratings, reviews, products
descriptionNullable:
Track etsy shops data on weekly/monthly basis. Metrics include shop profiles, sales , products etc.
The charts attached in this dataset shows two use caes of the data:
1) weekly top selling shops by sales volume (https://barkingdata.com/?etsy-top-shops/)
2) new created shops displayed in a time series (https://barkingdata.com/?etsy-new-shops-trend/ )

Available for download is  the top 10000 shops (ranked by sales volume as of Apr 3 2022).  [for illustration and educational purpose only]
Fields include: 
shop_id,shop_name,url,shop_create_date,shop_update_date,digital_listing_count,is_open,seller_name,sold_count,active_listing_count,status,
location,city,region,name,headline,favorites_count,average_rating,total_rating_count,geoname_id,country_code,currency_code,accepts_direct_checkout,accepts_paypal,ships_to_country_ids etc..
Shops Download Link:
[Click To Download](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/4cejknhyz1uljab/AABRf0XPWDqf1KPQOuYyRxBJa?dl=0)

If you are interested in building a dataset similar to this or for a different platform or even some granular categories , please contact  info@barkingdata.com
We specialize in web mining and web data harvesting from the world wide web (including mobile apps), we have built 5000+ datasets for researchers, analysts, scholars , retailers, ...
Learn more from https://www.barkingdata.com
